referred_to_by.content: Chief Msidi, Democratic Republic of the Congo, AF, 1888, given to British missionary Frederick Stanley Arnot. (?-1888); Frederick Stanley Arnot [1858-1914], probably Glasgow, SCT, 1914, by descent to his son Dr. Arthur A. Arnot. (1888-1914); Dr. Arthur A. Arnot, New York, NY, 1987, consigned for auction at Sotheby’s. (1914-1987); (Sotheby’s, Important Tribal Art, New York, NY, Nov. 10, 1987, Lot #79, sold to Philippe and Hélène Leloup for George Feher) (1987); George Feher, New York, NY, 1990s, acquired by Morris Pinto (1987-1990s); Morris Pinto, New York, NY, 1996, acquired by Philippe and Hélène Leloup (?-1996); Philippe and Hélène Leloup, Paris, FR, 2004, donated to Marie Victoire Koch (1996-2004); Marie Victoire Koch, Saint Mande, FR, 2004, sold to the Cleveland Museum of Art (2004); The Cleveland Museum of Art, Cleveland, OH, 2004 (2004)
